tool_description: Face Detection API finds faces in an image and crops them out.
name: Face detection
title: Face detection

api_list.name: Face detection from an image.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://face-detection13.p.rapidapi.com/face-detection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "face-detection13.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://face-detection13.p.rapidapi.com/face-detection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "face-detection13.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
